include.description: Specifies a list of directories (files/folders) to be included in watch. 'src' files are included by default and folders will be watched recursively for .rain files.

src.title: Source List (Compilation Mappings)
src.description: Specifies list of .rain source files mappings for compilation, where specified .rain input files will get compiled and results written into output json file.

items.title: Mapping
items.description: A single mappping item, all relative paths must be relative to current workspace root directory.

input.title: Input File Path
input.description: Path to a .rain file as source to read from.

output.title: Output File Path
output.description: Path to a .json file as output to write results into.

subgraphs.description: Specifies additional subgraph endpoints to search for a meta for a given hash, default rain subgraphs are always included.
subgraphs.markdownDescription: Specifies additional subgraph endpoints to search for a meta for a given hash, [default rain subgraphs](https://github.com/rainprotocol/meta/blob/master/src/rainSubgraphs.ts) are always included.

meta.title: Local Meta
meta.description: Spcifies local meta files paths or an object with path and hash (this will result in hash explicit validation) as binary or utf8 encoded hex strings starting with 0x.

binary.title: Local Binary Meta
binary.description: List of binary meta files paths (or object of path and hash).

path.description: The path of the binary meta file.

hash.description: The hash of the meta, will be explicitly checked against the data

hex.title: Local Hex String Meta
hex.description: List of utf8 encoded hex string starting with 0x meta files paths (or object of path and hash).

path.description: The path of the hex meta file.

hash.description: The hash of the meta, will be explicitly checked against the data.
